docs.snippet: Ben Johnson wants to present himself as a cautionary tale, a living lesson about the perils of doping, and a truth-teller in a world where he said cover-ups were as common as cleats....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ben Johnson wants to present himself as a cautionary tale, a living lesson about the perils of doping, and a truth-teller in a world where he said cover-ups were as common as cleats.
docs.abstract: Canadian sprinter Ben Johnson speaks out about his drug use during his career; Johnson’s Olympic medal was ultimately rescinded, and his legacy became one of cheating rather than sprinting.

headline.main: Sprinter in 1988 Olympic Scandal Deplores Doping
headline.print_headline: Sprinter in 1988 Olympic Scandal Denounces Doping
